1.0.0.name: wordpress/syntaxhighlighter-evolved-haskell-brush
1.0.0.description:
Adds support for the Haskell language to the SyntaxHighlighter Evolved plugin. You should install SyntaxHighlighter Evolved first.

Thanks to ArieShout(http://http://arieshout.me) for his shBrushHaskell.js.

Usage: [hs][/hs] [hask][/hask] [haskell][/haskell]
